profile.title: profile
profile.content: A fourth-year computer engineering student in a work-study program, I am seeking new challenges. With two years of experience as a Fullstack Developer, I have refined my front-end and back-end development skills. I am deeply committed to delivering high-quality solutions on time. My experience across various projects, programming languages, and frameworks has enabled me to become versatile and contribute effectively to the success of a dynamic team.

nsysu.1: Assistance in medical imaging analysis using machine learning

work-study-program.1: Experienced developer mastering frontend and backend technologies (API and web application) using Java Spring, Angular, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL.
work-study-program.2: Developed a graphical interface for verifying bank account details via the CoP system using an existing technical connector.
work-study-program.3: Worked on a collaborative SaaS solution to combat financial fraud.
work-study-program.4: Worked with microservice architectures orchestrated via Kubernetes.
work-study-program.5: Implemented agile methodologies such as Scrum and Kanban.
work-study-program.6: Strong problem-solving skills and a great attention to detail in code development.
work-study-program.7: Played a key role in optimizing application performance, enhancing user experience, and adding various features.

internship.1: Maintained the operational status of the application, integrated new features, and updated the design system.
internship.2: Improved and fixed unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests using Cypress to enhance code quality and application robustness.
internship.3: Contributed to migrating the application to a major Angular version.

cpe.dates-job-title: 2022 - 2025: Engineering Degree in Computer Science and Communication Networks (IRC)
cpe.1: Majors: Object-oriented programming, information systems architecture, dynamic web applications
cpe.2: Minors: Accounting, economics, project management, mathematics, English

dut.main-content: Two-year university degree in general computer science, covering data structures, operating systems, Git, several programming languages, UML, Merise, and more.

skills.title: skills
skills.content.1: Programming languages and frameworks among those I master
skills.content.2: Development, project management using agile methods, devOps tools
